content: i did buy token 11 month a go now its around 32B $ there is NO liquidity and I'm willing to sell it with 2M $ USDT token name BUGSBUNNY buy it from pancakeswaphttps://ibb.co/WBRkj6J

comments.author: ryzaadit
comments.created_time: August 09, 2023, 08:05:08 AMLast edit: August 09, 2023, 02:43:49 PM by ryzaadit
comments.body: There is no liquidity.That's mean no exchange at-all for selling these tokens, and how these estimations came out? did you get the estimation from explorer-estimation on the token list? Did you know most of the time these estimations have:- Scam token tried to impersonate the real token, and they update the information coin-information to their scam-contract- The price coin information not update anymore due there is no trade anymore and listed with the last price of these token sold.

comments.author: Al-Qisaer
comments.body: I did buy it 10 month ago the liquidity so low

comments.author: noorman0
comments.body: Quote from: Al-Qisaer on August 09, 2023, 07:51:03 AM-snip-now its around 300B $No, it is only an estimate based on the price history of the last successful trade. The unit price you asked is no longer valid, you must refer to the active bid price. Fantastic prices can be generated from the manipulation efforts of their own developers, and such tokens are actually common in DEXs.

comments.author: zactrainhd8
comments.body: I think it's a shitcoin, and it might not have enough liquidity when you try to sell it

comments.author: zactrainhd8
comments.body: What project is it? Why do you need everyone's advice? I can say that in the market, there are many meme coins, and you can think of them as lottery tickets.

comments.author: avikz
comments.body: Quote from: Al-Qisaer on August 09, 2023, 07:51:03 AMi did buy token 11 month a go now its around 32B $ there is NO liquidity and I'm willing to sell it with 2M $ USDT token name BUGSBUNNY buy it from pancakeswapThis is exactly what happens when you buy shitcoins. I personally hold $2 millions worth of shitcoins and can't sell it anymore. I accumulated them during 2017 ICO hype and lost every bit of it. Since I have experienced this personally, I do not advise anyone to buy shitcoins or memecoins anymore. All the best with attempt to sell it. This coin has no liquidity it seems. So I am sure that you wouldn't be able to sell them. But good luck to you.

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: You said it yourself — there is NO liquidity. Why do you think people would be willing to buy it for $2m? Heck, good luck selling it for $200.It’s not really worth $32b in the first place. I can literally create a shitcoin with a supply of $1,000,000, sell it for $1, and buy it for $1 on a separate wallet address and it’d be “worth” $1m — but obviously it’s not because no one would be willing to buy it.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: Al-Qisaer on August 09, 2023, 07:51:03 AMi did buy token 11 month a go now its around 32B $ there is NO liquidity and I'm willing to sell it with 2M $ USDT token name BUGSBUNNY buy it from pancakeswapWho in the world would buy it for $2 million when there is no liquidity? your thread is such a big joke this is what happens when you support shitcoin, which is manipulated by developers now you end up a bag holder, there's a big risk in investing in pump and dump coin, there will come a point when it will have zero liquidity, and this is exactly what happen to you you are late dumping your bag I would not even buy it for $5.This is a lesson learned for you and for all those who invest in pump and dump coin, invest in coins that have proven their worth in the market, and stop taking a chance on new coins, that is being shilled.

comments.author: Webetcoins
comments.body: What makes you think that someone would privately buy those tokens from you? Who in their right senses would pay $2m for a bunch of tokens that are worth nothing since you can't sell them for having no liquidity? Whenever you've bought them, you did a mistake and wasted your money by investing in a project that was nothing more than a scam that must have run away already and these tokens are now totally worthless, I'm sorry for your loss though.These things teach us that we should always make sure that we are investing our money in credible and trustworthy projects and not some kind of shitcoins or meme coins which might have some hype initially but that will disappear soon and then they will lose more than 90% of their value in no time.
